long_description: Sized right for up-and-coming freestyle masters weighing between 53 and 165 lbs., the Marker M 7.0 Free bindings provide reliable release and great skiing performance. During a backward or twisting fall, the Biotech(R) toe's upward-release system reduces the forces playing against young joints and bones. Lightweight Compact Junior Heel offers optimum performance and easy step-in/step-out convenience. Edge Pressure System equalizes the force between the toe and the heel for clean carving, enhanced edge hold and improved stability. Stainless-steel antifriction device allows essential lateral boot movement despite dirty or worn soles or negative sliding friction. 85mm-wide brakes fit most junior powder and freestyle skis. Catering to lightweight skiers, DIN range of 2 - 7 allows bindings to release boots easily in the event of a tumble.
